dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.
dependencies.name: py-markupsafe

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A simple Python wheel builder for simple projects.
dependencies.name: py-whey

dependencies.description: Extension to whey to support .pth files.
dependencies.name: py-whey-pth

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Pyomo is a Python-based open-source software package that supports a
diverse set of optimization capabilities for formulating and analyzing
optimization models.
dependent_to.name: py-pyomo

dependent_to.description: Box of handy tools for Sphinx.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-toolbox

description: Patches Jinja2 v3 to restore compatibility with earlier Sphinx versions.
name: py-sphinx-jinja2-compat

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
